explains: n. 州长；郡治安官；执行吏
n. （Sheriff）人名；（英、葡）谢里夫；（阿拉伯）谢里夫

sentences.en: Robyn asked the deputy on duty if she could speak with Sheriff Adkins.
sentences.cn: 萝宾问值班警官她能否跟县治安官阿德金斯谈话。

sentences.en: I can't believe you're the sheriff!
sentences.cn: 我简直不能相信你是警长！

sentences.en: There is only one sheriff in the city.
sentences.cn: 这个城市只有一个治安官。
